title: [ATTENTION ALL ELO!]EnLightenGG Looking for ADC,Jungle,Mid!
body:
[EnLightenGG] Looking for players who will be dedicated playing with 5 players to improve together and attitude is important. Practice starts around 10 PM EST. We will be playing under an experienced organization and they are looking for the team to also stream, make sure your able to stream before posting to the board.This team is serious and if you have any questions, message me. -hG Vonix

Looking For: ADC,Mid,Jungle

> IGN:
> Rank:
> Role
> Top 5 Champs:
> Strengths:
> Comments/Questions:

replies.body:
IGN:Phytogenic64
Rank:Plat 3
Role: adc
Top 5 Champs: Vayne, Ashe, Sivir, Trist, Jinx( can play all adcs besides mf and quinn)
Strengths:Communication and game knowledge(playing since season 2, did some analyst work for CoL in season 4)
Comments/Questions:A few but will save for a personal chat.

IGN: Resentz
Rank: S5
Role: Jungle
Top 5 Champs: Rekt'Sai, Amumu, Rammus, J4, Gragas
Strengths: Communicating with cd's, good idea of how to jg and routes, ganking, and jugling turret agro
Comments/Questions: N/A

IGN: Seerterror
Rank: Gold 4
Role: ADC
Top 5 Champs: Sivir, Jinx, Tristana, Lucian, Graves
Strengths: Laning phase and 5v5 teamfights
Comments/Questions: N/A
